input_text:
Job Title: Lead Software Engineer- Android

Location: New York, United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
This inclusive employer is a member of myGwork – the largest global platform for the LGBTQ+ business community.  

Born from the successful launch of Chase in 2021, we're a dynamic team dedicated to creating customer-centric products that address real-world problems. Our success hinges on our team's collaboration, curiosity, and commitment, all fostered in an environment that encourages skill development and potential realization.

Job Summary

As a Lead Software Engineer at JPMorgan Chase within the engineering team, you are the heart of this venture, focused on getting smart ideas into the hands of our customers. You have a curious mindset, thrive in collaborative squads, and are passionate about new technology. By your nature, you are also solution-oriented, commercially savvy and have a head for fintech. You thrive in working in tribes and squads that focus on specific products and projects – and depending on your strengths and interests, you'll have the opportunity to move between them.

Job Responsibilities

Develop and maintain advanced Android applications using Kotlin, Jetpack Compose, Dagger/Hilt, and modern architectural patterns using MVVM, Use Cases, Repositories and Clean Architecture.Utilize Android's robust library ecosystem, including Coroutines and Flow, to build responsive and efficient apps.Implement and maintain local data storage using Room.Collaborate in an Agile environment, utilizing Jira for project management, Git for version control, while working in a fast paste CI/CD environment, targeting rapid, reliable and repeatable deployment of high-quality software.Write comprehensive unit tests for code quality and functionality.

Required Qualifications, Capabilities And Skills

Formal training or certification on Android app development concepts and 5+ years applied experienceBachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field, or equivalent industry experienceExperience in developing financial applications or identity management systems, coupled with a strong understanding of and best practices for developing secure applications. Excellent communication and problem-solving skills.Ability to work both independently and effectively in a team environment.

Preferred Qualifications, Capabilities And Skills

Understanding of strong security protocols is a plus.Engagement in team collaborations and drive individual projects to completion.Contributions to the design of clean, user-centric interfaces.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: Lead Software Engineer- Android
output_json.summary: Inclusive employer seeking a Lead Software Engineer with expertise in Android development, focusing on customer-centric product creation.
preferred_degrees: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field
soft_skills: Works well in tribes and squads
job_responsibilities: Develop and maintain advanced Android applications
Implement and maintain local data storage
output_json.company_information: Inclusive employer, member of myGwork, dynamic team focused on customer-centric product creation, fostering collaboration, curiosity, and skill development.
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: Employer is inclusive and part of myGwork, the largest global platform for the LGBTQ+ business community.
